All BLPs in warcraft 3 FT are BLP1 (RoC used BLP0, WoW uses BLP2)
There is a total of 6266 BLP images in current version of warcraft 3
There are 2 main compression types: compression = 0 - jpeg- used by 4917 images compression = 1 - paletted- used by 1349 images
There are 2 flag values: flags = 0 -noalpha- 3874 flags = 8 -alpha- 2392
There are 7 picture types: pictureType = 2.1 - 392 pictureType = 3.0 - 123 pictureType = 3.1 - 245 pictureType = 4.0 - 92 pictureType = 4.1 - 1905 pictureType = 5.0 - 46 pictureType = 5.1 - 3463
